title: Data roaming not working after Android 11 update
content:
Hi,

I am using a Pixel 5 and a French SIM card (Orange) in England. Since Android 11 update, I don't have mobile data anymore

- it was working fine before 
- My phone + British SIM card works
- My SIM card + other phone works 
- I tried to reset "Wifi, mobile & Bluetooth settings" , it didn't solve th issue (Roaming is on)

Thanks
Theo
